adjacent_analytics.title: Proposal: Building the Future of NFTs: The Rarible Protocol - Arbitrum Integration Proposal [REVISED]
adjacent_analytics.author: 0x1B686eE8E31c5959D9F5BBd8122a58682788eeaD

decision.summary: The proposal requests a strategic grant for Radiant Capital to expand liquidity and ecosystem growth on Arbitrum, with a milestone-based approach ensuring efficiency and accountability.
key_arguments_for: Radiant has demonstrated significant TVL growth (19%) and user base increase (52%) following prior ARB airdrop campaigns.
The proposal is milestone-driven with transparency reports and safeguards against over-allocation.
Radiant is the second largest protocol by TVL on Arbitrum and a key liquidity provider, supporting ecosystem health.
Community sentiment in the forum is largely positive, highlighting Radiant's professionalism and impact.
key_arguments_against: Concerns about the high allocation (up to 70%) to RDNT-linked dLP incentives possibly deterring external users.
Some view the tokenomics as a potential barrier for new users who must buy and lock RDNT tokens.
Questions raised about mercenary liquidity and whether incentives overly favor insiders.
Calls for more ARB allocation toward broader ecosystem initiatives rather than primarily boosting RDNT.

evidence.reference: Arbitrum Foundation forum thread: Radiant Final STIP Round 1
evidence.quote: Forum sentiment is predominately positive with 18 positive, 13 negative, and 17 neutral comments. Early comments praise the detailed proposal, milestone structure, and Radiant's impact on Arbitrum's ecosystem.
Voting shows unanimous early lead and stability for 'For' option with 100% lead ratio and strong vote power concentration early in the voting period.

evidence.reference: Similar past proposal: Building the Future of NFTs: The Rarible Protocol - Arbitrum Integration Proposal
evidence.quote: Prior similar proposal had strong early support but post-vote market impact showed declines, indicating importance of milestone-based grant allocation and cautious approach.

decision.ai_final_conclusion: Option 'For' selected with stance to keep 'Change'.
decision.ai_final_reason:
• The voting timeline metrics show a strong, stable early consensus for the 'For' option, indicating decisive community support.
• Forum sentiment is mostly positive with detailed endorsements highlighting Radiant's success and milestone-based approach, though some concerns about tokenomics and incentives exist.
• Market impact and TVL changes from similar past proposals caution against over-allocating funds, but Radiant's milestone guards and transparency mitigate this risk.
• The recommendation aligns with aggregated community sentiment, supporting a change that advances Arbitrum's ecosystem growth and liquidity health.
• The milestone-based grant with performance conditions and transparency reports maximizes accountability and reduces risk.
• Overall, supporting this proposal balances growth, risk management, and community interest for durable benefit.
